code: /**  * The value of the sum.  */ public double value() {     return value. }
/**  * The correction term.  */ public double delta() {     return delta. }

comment: /**  * Increments the Kahan sum by adding a value and a correction term.  */
code: /**  * Increments the Kahan sum by adding a value and a correction term.  */ public CompensatedSum add(double value, double delta) {     return add(new CompensatedSum(value, delta)). }

comment: /**  * Increments the Kahan sum by adding a value without a correction term.  */
code: /**  * Increments the Kahan sum by adding a value without a correction term.  */ public CompensatedSum add(double value) {     return add(new CompensatedSum(value, NO_CORRECTION)). }

comment: /**  * Increments the Kahan sum by adding two sums, and updating the correction term for reducing numeric errors.  */
code: /**  * Increments the Kahan sum by adding two sums, and updating the correction term for reducing numeric errors.  */ public CompensatedSum add(CompensatedSum other) {     double correctedSum = other.value() + (delta + other.delta()).     double updatedValue = value + correctedSum.     double updatedDelta = correctedSum - (updatedValue - value).     return new CompensatedSum(updatedValue, updatedDelta). }
